content.label: This game needs to be known more. I love this game.

A work of art.
Here are some fun things you can do:
Go lava fishing on the moon
Mine for treasures in secret underground biomes
Build a mansion made of precious minerals
Wear a zombie hat while teleporting to a jungle planet
Attack skeletons that throw dynamite at you
Collect one of the thousands of treasures and display them on your wall (there are so many references)
Mine with your friends
Run for your life while a giant slime hops after you
Have a pet unicorn follow you around
Become tiny
Wear a fish‚Äôs head
Become huge
Destroy mummies on the desert planet Seth
Wear things like sunglasses, top hats, golem heads, space zombie boots, bandanas, slime chest plates, and hundreds of other bizarre and wonderful things
Farm tons of plants such as the ‚ÄúHarry Vervain Bean‚Äù
Put an octopus in your aquarium
About five thousand other things

And, for the record, Junk Jack came out -BEFORE- Terraria.

Playing it from the launch and consider JJ the best mix of complexity and simplicity. It‚Äôs just the best explore/craft game for me. As i get a new ios device - this one is always gets the space on it. With the latest fix [alas it was a year ago] the game became as close to PERFECTION as possible. Please, DEVELOPERS, continue support of this gem through changing ios versions and THANK YOU

I would love for junk jack to have frequent updates also I‚Äôm a big fan and I enjoy playing also my gaming partner.
If there was many more updates I would be honored to be sponsored by you guys and stream on YouTube to get recognition  the game deserves.

I‚Äôve been playing since the days of the original Junk Jack and loved the release of Junk Jack X. I can‚Äôt say that there is a more random sandbox out there that is so perfect. I wish this was advertised more so that I could see even more content on this game that I love so dearly. I can‚Äôt even begin to tell you how many hours I‚Äôve spent messing around with one of my friends and I hope this game stays out there for as long as possible.

Honestly, I went into this one thinking ‚Äújoy, another terraria/ Minecraft clone‚Äù. This game is actually really unique though. The diverse crafting options and huge mechanic of being able to travel to different worlds makes a very exciting and fun experience. Micro transactions are very fairly priced and I love the simplification of the crafting menu. Very underrated.

Also I love the music on this. Almost enough to make me give it five stars on that alone. Really brings good atmosphere to the different planets.

The Steam version of the game got controller support, it‚Äôs about time for it to come to mobile as well. The game can be very uncomfortable to play for people like me that play on an iPad, and since iOS now has controller support, Junk Jack should also be one the games to be adapted. 
PLEASE, more than once I decided not to play the game because I didn‚Äôt want my hands and wrists to be sore.
That‚Äôs the only reason I‚Äôm not giving full five stars.

title.label: Great but could use some work.

content.label:
I love playing Terraria and this is just as awesome but there‚Äôs a few problems I have with it.
The game keeps glitching/kicking me out of the app and not saving, so I have resorted to pausing the game every so often to not lose any of my progress when it doesn‚Äôt auto save.
I haven‚Äôt started going to other worlds yet but is there items like in ‚ÄúTerraria‚Äù as in magic mirror, hook shot, or wings in Junk Jack to help move around better? If not, it would be really awesome if there was !

title.label: Hard to pick up and drag items

content.label:
I‚Äôve been having a hard time dragging items. 
It only speedsters the stack or doesn‚Äôt move at all it‚Äôs extremely annoying

After 75hrs of playing this game on my iPad Pro 11 inch, I couldn‚Äôt imagine the amount of efforts that have been put in this game.

Textures are well made, sound design, gameplay control and every thing looks perfect!, and this game is really deep, it‚Äôs not simple!, every time I say ok, looks like there is nothing left, and then I realize there are tons of things I haven‚Äôt explored.

I play this game in very hard mode, and it‚Äôs not quite challenging for me, I believe it‚Äôs a collecting + building creativity driven game not challenging driven.

No regret about 5$ + 2$ spent in IAP at all!.

I LOVE IT, and hope the devs are doing well to come with new major updates!.
Not into spending hours and hours to find 2 lumps of iron.

title.label: Game crashed and deleted all my progress!!!!!

content.label: I‚Äôve been playing junk jack since it came out and love it. But the game (version 3.2.1) crashed when I was doing multiplayer (direct) and deleted everything (all my worlds, everything I mined for). I basically had to make a new character and start from scratch :(!!!!! Please fix this crash. PS pixbits should bring back the duplication glitch :)
Would love to see mifi support!!!!!

title.label: My favorite game on IOS but now crashes.

content.label: I have played this game for days and it is so much fun! But one day the game started crashing a lot, it usually happens while I‚Äôm climbing ladders and also sometimes in other situations. It‚Äôs gotten to the point where the game is unplayable, it started really recently, so it‚Äôs not because of the latest update. I tried offloading the game and getting it again, but it didn‚Äôt help. If the developer sees this, please fix this crashing, I LOVE this game, but I can‚Äôt play it right now because of the crashing. Thank you for making such a great game, I hope this gets fixed soon.

I don‚Äôt understand what I‚Äôm doing wrong but I cannot for the life of me use the forge. It‚Äôs built and I have the right ingredients to make a cooked egg but I can‚Äôt make the cooked egg. I can‚Äôt drag anything into a slot in the forge and no matter where I click nothing happens. I‚Äôve googled it and it says I should drag the needed items into the forge... again that does not work. I‚Äôm feeling really discouraged in this game when it comes to crafting as the forge isn‚Äôt working and I can‚Äôt make any other workbenches that I need. I‚Äôll still give 4 stars as it‚Äôs a good game and I recently switched to this from terraria since the controls there are basically unusable

This game is an amazing survival game! Multiplayer is loads of fun and the game has lots of fun content to explore! Hopefully it‚Äôll keep getting updated don‚Äôt want the game to no longer work anymore :(

But don‚Äôt let that stop you. If there‚Äôs anything good that came from the Minecraft terraria boom is this game right here. Probably remember playing this a ton when I started highschool and remember there was a save glitch that let you exponentially double your items.  Good time for anyone
I don‚Äôt get how people play this I‚Äôm a veteran Terraria And Minecraft player and this game is hard and kinda boring.

You won‚Äôt go wrong with buying this!!
I absolutely love everything about this game, but can y‚Äôall please update it. There are a few bugs here and there. For example I some how lost my unicorn pet and it was placed on a shelf so idk how it despawned.
Please and thank you
Idk of il just stupid or what. But when I‚Äôm trying to make wood boards I need a wood plank, but u use wood boards to make the plank! Like what‚Äôs going on!!

Hey, I really enjoy how this game allows creative gameplay on mobile similarly to MC and terraria but manages to set itself apart with how well it works on the mobile platform. I like to listen to music when i play games and i wish this wasn‚Äôt an application that paused my spotify music. That means a lot to me, otherwise i‚Äôd give 5 stars.
Terraria who?

I Love junk jack all the features in the game like gameplay and other things etc. but if you could make a update for this amazing game it would be updating one of the armor  sets. Like the primate silk set but if you add like a head piece for the set.

Primate ideas üèπ:
I had a thing for people who were in the woods and the wilderness and I had a idea for junk jack which was maybe adding a few more things to the junk jack universe!

Note for developers of the game üîß:
I was thinking if you could add a few more things that were primatial. Like tents or a few more armors that were primate like: stone armor, wool hoodie, and the campfire if you could make it have a tab (like the forge) and the tab would require |a fire starter| with the fire starter you could start the fire and it would have a time limit of (4 game hours) and it would run out but it would need (sticks, wood and maybe coal) to keep the fire going. It would cook raw meat, pig meat, chicken, insect meat and etc. but not the ores. That‚Äôs a idea I have for the developers of junk jack (if you read this whole review.)

tent features for junk jack üß±:
 I also would really like to see if you could add like a tent for when you begin in the game you have bear hands crafting tab but the tent requires (Crafting pieces: 6 raw wool or some sort of wool you can refine in your bear hands like flat tied wool and this is the reprice for it |Flat tied wool: 6 pieces of grass 3 pieces of wool| and the Other parts are 4 sticks and a piece of wood in the middle and under it is one piece of 1 bamboo. Which crafts- - > primate tent.

Other idea I had üí°:

That‚Äôs all the ideas I had for the developers of junk jack keep making this game a blast! And have a good day! üòçüòéüëçüòÄ

title.label: Love the game but needs a bug fix

content.label: I LOVE this game, been playing for years and still haven‚Äôt gotten bored with it. The new cheat interface is awesome too. It‚Äôs made it so much easier to navigate my gear and items. I only have one complaint, for whatever reason lately the app will just close out mid game and it‚Äôs not saving my progress. My inventory is saved but my world reverts back to the last save and I‚Äôm not sure why. I would really like to continue playing but I can‚Äôt make any progress with it doing this. Other than that I thank you for your dedication and i will probably continue playing this for years to come, keep up the great work!!! :D
